DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective research study test feasibility brief Internet-based intervention reduce heavy alcohol use among young adult veteran war Iraq Afghanistan . Veterans recruit social medium website Facebook two phase . In first phase , investigator collect data 800 veteran participant document analyze drinking norm population . In second phase , investigator use norm collect Phase 1 information analysis develop pilot test online intervention young adult veteran participant . Six hundred participant recruit Facebook randomly assign intervention ( N = 300 ) control ( N = 300 ) condition . It hypothesize intervention condition drink less one-month follow-up period control condition . Investigators also collect feedback participant usability online intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Online Program Young Adult Veteran Drinkers
DOC.criteria: 1 . United States veteran Operation Enduring Freedom , Operation Iraqi Freedom , Operation New Dawn discharge separated Army , Navy , Marines , Air Force currently reserve 2. age 18 34 3. ability read English ( also requirement military service ) 4. access computer Internet 5. email address 6 ) AUDIT score > 4 ( men ) > 3 ( woman ) order reach may benefit intervention target toward reduce alcohol misuse None besides meet inclusion criterion
